thread.title: First photos of Khloe Kardashian inside hospital
thread.title_full: First photos of Khloe Kardashian inside hospital - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: First photos of Khloe Kardashian inside hospital
text:
ALMA/AKM-GSI Khloe Kardashian grabbing a quick bite while keeping vigil beside estranged husband Lamar Odom’s bedside. Enlarge ALMA/AKM-GSI Khloe Kardashian is pictured for the first time, inside Sunrise Hospital, since estranged husband Lamar Odom was found unconscious. Enlarge Khloe Kardashian is pictured for the first time, inside Sunrise Hospital, since estranged husband Lamar Odom was found unconscious.
Lamar Odom has a long and arduous journey ahead of him but can expect to have estranged wife Khloe Kardashian right by his side.
The reality star, 31, has been a constant presence at the Sunrise Hospital in Nevada since Odom was rushed there last Tuesday.
In exclusive photos Kardashian, taken Thursday, the youngest sister is seen walking through a hospital floor munching on a breakfast sandwich.
KARDASHIANS TWEET HAPPY NEWS ABOUT LAMAR ODOM
Odom's ex-college coach Jim Harrick visited him and told CNN during an appearance on “New Day” that Odom is breathing on his own and told Khloe, "I love you."
Mariotto/Fresh/Lek/INFphoto.com Kim kardahsian, Kendall Jenner, and Khloe's best friend Malika Haqq seen leaving Sunrise Hospital in Las Vegas, NV where Lamar Odom is being treated. Harrick praised Khloe, calling her "a rock" and the "best thing that's ever happened" to Odom.
According to TMZ , doctors have reportedly told Odom’s family and friends that rehabilitation will take several months and it’s not clear yet how much damage is permanent.
View Gallery The life and career of Lamar Odom LAMAR ODOM 'WAY, WAY BETTER', TALKING WITH FAMILY MEMBERS
The ex-NBA star, 35, will be having speech, physical and other therapists to help him recover and Khloe is in there for the long haul.
Kevin Mazur/TCA 2010/WireImage Khloe Kardashian and Lamar Odom in happier times in 2010. The couple who were married for four years have both signed final divorce documents , but the papers will not be signed off by a judge for another couple of months, the gossip site noted.
Odom was hospitalized on Tuesday after being found unconscious in a Nevada brothel and was in a coma for almost three days. E! News reports that he has begun to communicate using hand signals and left his hospital bed and was able to sit in a chair with assistance.
He has a phalanx of doctors including a neurologist, cardiologist, primary care doctor and a critical care physician. E! reports that Khloe, 31, has been diligently working with them and thanks all of the health care workers every time and gift baskets and food are delivered daily.
Odom’s children, Destiny and Lamar Jr., their mother Liza Morales and Odom’s father Joe have all been spotted at the hospital as well as a steady stream of Kardashian/Jenner family members.
Related Stories Lamar Odom: His life, career and troubles through the years Video shows Lamar Odom drinking, popping pill at brothel Lamar Odom out of coma, breathing on his own Tags: khloe kardashian , lamar odom
